Description.SourceString: In addition to level upgrades, Heroes can improve their stats in several ways. They can upgrade their gear by building a Crystal Forge and using ore from the Burny Mine. They can consume rare drop elixirs for stat upgrades, be promoted with elemental shards, and be evolved to improve their skills.
